Documenta√ß√£o da API de Carteira de Clientes.

---

### üîë Autentica√ß√£o (A partir da v0.2.4)

A autentica√ß√£o agora utiliza **JSON Web Tokens (JWT)**. Para acessar os endpoints protegidos, siga os passos abaixo:

1.  **Obter o Token:**
    * Execute o endpoint de login: **`POST /api/auth/login`**.
    * Use suas credenciais de usu√°rio e senha no corpo da requisi√ß√£o (Request Body).

2.  **Autorizar o Swagger (OpenAPI):**
    * Copie o **token JWT** retornado no campo `access_token`.
    * Clique no bot√£o **"Authorize"** (Autorizar) no topo da p√°gina.
    * Cole o token no campo de autentica√ß√£o (Geralmente no formato **`Bearer SeuTokenAqui`**).

3.  **Executar M√©todos:**
    * Com o token configurado no Swagger, voc√™ pode executar todos os m√©todos protegidos.

---

**Credenciais de Teste:**
* **Usu√°rio:** `user`
* **Senha:** `password`

tags.name: Wallet Operator
tags.description: Centralized Hub for Customer, Wallet and Transaction operations

get.description: Retrieves a wallet by ID. Admin-only operation.

put.description: Updates a wallet by ID. Admin-only operation.

get.description: Retrieves customer data by ID. Admin-only operation.

put.description: Updates an existing customer by ID. Admin-only operation.

get.description: Retrieves all wallets with optional status filter. Admin-only operation.

post.description: Creates a new wallet. Admin-only operation.
Creates a WITHDRAW transaction for the authenticated user's wallet.
Creates a TRANSFER transaction from the authenticated user's wallet.
Creates a DEPOSIT transaction for the authenticated user's wallet.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of customers. Admin-only operation.

post.description: Creates a new customer. Admin-only operation.

get.description: Returns the wallet associated with the authenticated user (JWT context).

get.summary: List all wallets of the authenticated customer
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all wallets belonging to the customer identified by the JWT token.
Retrieves wallets by customer ID. Admin-only operation.

get.summary: Get my wallet details and balance

get.description: Retrieves a transaction by ID. Admin-only operation.
Retrieves transactions for the authenticated user's wallet.
Retrieves the last 150 WITHDRAW operations for the authenticated user's wallet.
Retrieves the last 150 DEPOSIT operations for the authenticated user's wallet.
Retrieves transactions by wallet ID. Admin-only operation.
Returns customer data associated with the authenticated user (JWT context).

DepositSender.description: Deposit Sender associated with the transaction

MovementTransaction.description: Transfer Money associated with the moviment
